name: Buzz Bissinger
description:
H. G. "Buzz" Bissinger keeps reinventing himself.

First, he was known as an investigative journalist, whose work detailing corruption in the Philadelphia court system won him a Pulitzer prize.

Then, he was known as a best-selling author, penning "Friday Night Lights", the gospel of high school football.

Then, he became an anti-blogging crusader, whose takedown of Deadspin founder Will Leitch was vindictive and disgraceful.

Then, he became a blogger himself.

Then, he came out as a shopaholic, whose million-dollar Gucci bill sent him to rehab.

Then...

Well, the night is young.
